name.ch: 微型化生醫感測設計與臨床應用

department.en: Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering

goal.ch:
本課程將介紹可穿戴健康監測技術的最新進展，解釋其得以提高醫學診斷準確性和可靠性的基礎原理。同時將說明這些技術結合個人化的電子裝置如何有助於實現閉環式個人化醫療管理，讓患者經由有效回饋關注自己的健康，關注真實的生活型態和模式對健康的影響。
本課程的目標是希望學生更好地理解穿戴式裝置在健康促進的最新技術。因此，修習本課程碩專學生背景可以是穿戴技術、生物醫學專家或計算機科學和電子工程師，或者希望獲得新穎的研究思路和可穿戴技術培訓的學生。
goal.en:
課程目標本課程將介紹可穿戴健康監測技術的最新進展，解釋其得以提高醫學診斷準確性和可靠性的基礎原理。同時將說明這些技術結合個人化的電子裝置如何有助於實現閉環式個人化醫療管理，讓患者經由有效回饋關注自己的健康，關注真實的生活型態和模式對健康的影響。
本課程的目標是希望學生更好地理解穿戴式裝置在健康促進的最新技術。因此，修習本課程碩專學生背景可以是穿戴技術、生物醫學專家或計算機科學和電子工程師，或者希望獲得新穎的研究思路和可穿戴技術培訓的學生。
This course will present recent advances in wearable health monitoring technology. These recent advances in this field yield the potentials to improve the accuracy and reliability of medical diagnoses. In addition, their integration in the everyday personal electronic devices will re-ignite human-computer interaction enabling a more intimate relationship with electronic devices that will help to close the loop of personalized medicine empowering patients of their own health focusing on the real lifestyle and daily routine. The goal of this course is to provide a better understanding of the “state of the art” in this matter; therefore, this course is intended for the students who are wearable technology experts, biomedical, computer science, and electronics engineers (researchers and graduate students) and who wish to get novel research ideas and some training in wearable technologies.

outline.ch:
第1~3 周 基於心電圖訊號的智慧型遠距心血管監護系統
第4~5 周 基於光電脈搏訊號的無創血壓量測
第6~7 周 居家睡眠品監測系統
第8 周   穿戴式裝置應用於睡眠障礙
第9~10 周 以智慧多感測器達成非侵入式健康狀態評估
第 11~12 周 運用可穿戴傳感器系統監測駕駛員疲勞狀態
第 13~14 周 穿戴式裝置達成以患者為導向的醫療照護
第 15~16 周 評估腦部功能活動產生的複雜系統的定量方式
第 17~18 周 應用智慧物聯網於跌倒偵測
outline.en:
Weeks 1~3
ECG for Remote Health Monitoring of Cardiovascular Diseases
Weeks 4 ~5
PPG-Based Non-invasive Methodologies for Pervasive Monitoring of Vitals:BP
and HR
Weeks 6 ~7
Sleep Monitoring Wearables: Present to Future
Week8
Sleep Monitoring in Adults Using Wearables and Unobtrusive Technology
Weeks 9~10
Non-invasive Monitoring of Health Using Sensor-Rich Wearables and Smart Devices
Weeks 11~12
Wearable Sensor System to Monitor the Status of the Automobile Drivers
Weeks 13~14
Patient-Driven Wearable Technology to Improve Quality of Life
Weeks 15~16
A Novel Architecture Design for Complex Network Measures of Brain Connectivity Aiding Diagnosis
Weeks 17~18
IoT and Machine Learning Algorithms for Fall Detection
